resources.string: Please scan your fingerprint or your face to proceed.
You are about to remove an account. Are you sure you want to proceed with this choice?
Password did not match with previous password.
Are you sure you want to delete this contact?
You should enter your correct password to display your passphrase
There\'s no biometric registration or biometric hardware found on the device
You\'re trying to send transaction to account whose balance is lesser than minimum balance. The amount must be at least amountPlaceholder algos.
Transaction amount results in a balance below the minimum account balance of algos.
Transaction amount cannot be more than your available amount.
Transaction amount results in a negative balance.
You earn rewards just by owning Algos! Here’s a summary of your rewards activity since your last transaction. These rewards are always included in your balance.
For more information on Algorand\nRewards, visit our FAQ
Account to be sent must have 58 characters long public key.
The internet connection appears to be offline.
Your account is about to be deleted, are you sure you want to proceed?
To keep an account open, the account must have at least 0.01 ALGO. If you send the max amount, the account will be deleted and your active participation keys will be deleted as well.
In order to delete an account, you must empty any asset account balance and destroy any asset you\'ve created, if any.
You don\'t have any account with this asset. Add asset before continue.
Error occurred while fetching more. Try again later.
Adding an asset requires sending a transaction with a minimum transaction fee. This will appear on your transaction history.
Unfortunately, this account has not added this asset. Please instruct the account owner to add the asset, and then try again.
Account does not accept this asset
You are about to receive an asset!
You need at least Algos to add this asset
Your accounts do not contain this asset
Please add this asset and try again.
Key not valid, please make sure you have the right key.
You just scanned a QR code of a transaction request. Please review all transaction fields as they may have changed.
Make sure that your ledger device is on and has Bluetooth enabled.
Open the Algorand app on your Ledger.
Make sure Bluetooth is enabled on your smartphone.

Assets that go through our verification process are known projects that have their website and public information verified against this specific ASA. Verification status is not an endorsement of the asset.
Pera Wallet does not have any relationship with verified ASA owners. This badge is for informational purposes only.
That being said, you should always double check that the asset\'s ID is the one that you intended to choose before transacting with that asset.
If you have questions about the verification process or general feedback about the app, we encourage you to visit;
Please make sure to confirm the transaction on your Ledger device ledgerNamePlaceholder

string.name: ledger_info_power_first_paragraph
string.annotation: For general usage of your Ledger’s Bluetooth feature, please refer to Ledger’s official Bluetooth Connection Guide.

string.name: ledger_info_power_second_paragraph
string.annotation: For more advanced troubleshooting, please refer to Ledger’s official Bluetooth Troubleshooting Guide.

string.name: ledger_info_ledger_first_paragraph
string.annotation: Begin by following Ledger’s comprehensive Getting Started tutorial.

resources.string: When the tutorial gets to the point where it directs you to “select the application(s) you want to install on your device,” type Algorand in the search bar and install.

string.name: ledger_info_algorand_first_paragraph
string.annotation: Continue with Ledger’s Getting Started tutorial, which will direct you how to install and open apps on your ledger device.

resources.string: If you haven’t already installed the Algorand app on your Ledger device, when the tutorial gets to the point where it directs you to “Select the application(s) you want to install on your device,” type Algorand in the search bar and install.
Could not connect to the Ledger device. Make sure the device is unlocked, nearby and has bluetooth enabled.
Please open the Algorand App on your ledger device.
Bluetooth must be enabled on your device in order to search for nearby Ledger devices.
Location permission needs to be granted in order to search nearby Ledgers.
We were unable to send the transaction to the ledger device. Please try again.
We were unable to receive the public key of your ledger device. Please try again.
The paired ledger device has cancelled the transaction request.
The device you are trying to connect to is not supported with the Pera Wallet.
Please ensure that location services are enabled.
Try different asset name or asset id
You haven\'t added any contacts yet
Please try a different contact name.
No transactions have been made with this asset.
Yes, Remove All Accounts and Logout
Press and hold to Copy to Clipboard
Your recent transactions, asset requests and other notifications will appear here
To remove an asset, you must first transfer that asset\'s balance to another account.
We couldn’t reach the server, make sure you are connected to the internet
Replace your account ledger with a new Ledger Device
Replace your account’s passphrase with a Ledger Device.
Future transactions will be signed by your new Ledger Device.
This account\'s passphrase will no longer function for this account.
Your old Ledger device will no longer function for this account.
Your account’s public key, balances, and configuration will not change.
The account \" \" has been successfully rekeyed.
addressPlaceholder has added assetPlaceholder to their account. You can send them assetPlaceholder.
addressPlaceholder is trying to send you assetPlaceholder however, you do not support this. Tap here to add this asset to your account.
Your transaction of amountPlaceholder assetPlaceholder from addressPlaceholder to addressPlaceholder is complete.
Your transaction of amountPlaceholder assetPlaceholder from addressPlaceholder to addressPlaceholder has failed.
amountPlaceholder assetPlaceholder were sent to addressPlaceholder by addressPlaceholder.
This ledger device can sign transactions for the following accounts. Select the accounts to add to your Pera Wallet.
This account has been rekeyed. In order to sign transactions, please recover this account with a passphrase or Ledger device.
By creating an account, you agree to Pera Wallet\'s Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy
Choose the account you want to use for signing this account.
A network error occurred while fetching account details. Please restart the process.
It appears this Ledger device has been reset and the account on the device no longer matches this account. Please pair the Ledger again from the homepage.
When sending to an address for the first time, it’s useful to send a small test transaction before sending a large amount.
Exchanges change their deposit addresses frequently, and saved exchange addresses may no longer be in use. Ensure you\'re sending to the correct address.
For more information on transacting, tap here
Before you finalize, keep in mind a couple of tips:
The transaction cannot be completed because the amount will put your account below minimum required balance of min_balance_placeholder Algos.
Create a passphrase backup for your account

Creating a passphrase backup will allow you to recover your account. Without the passphrase, if you lose your device, remove the account or delete the app, you can permanently lose access to your Algorand account!
Prepare to write down your recovery passphrase
The only way to recover an Algorand account is with this recovery passphrase.
In the following steps, you\'ll enter your 25-word recovery passphrase to recover an Algorand account. Have your recovery phrase handy before you begin.
I want to monitor an account that\'s held in cold storage.
The last copied text is not valid passphrase with 25 words. Please copy valid passphrase and try again.
Make sure to record these words in the correct order, using the corresponding numbers.
This 6-digit PIN will be required to use the Pera Wallet. We highly recommend creating a PIN to help increase wallet security in the event your phone is stolen.
Increase your security with a PIN
You need to create an account to start transacting your assets.
Selected words are wrong. Please try again.
Monitor activity of an account without needing a recovery passphrase. This is useful for monitoring assets that are kept in cold storage
You are creating a read-only view of an Algorand account. If you send assets to this account and you do not have the corresponding recovery passphrase, those assets will be lost.
Name your account to easily identify it while using the Pera Wallet. These names are stored locally, and can only be seen by you.
Keep this recovery passphrase in a secure location that is accessible only by you. Do not lose this recovery passphrase.
You can make the process of sending assets faster by adding new contacts.
The following account addresses will display on your Ledger device. Please carefully compare and verify each address in order to finalize device pairing.
This address is already in your contacts as %1$s. Would you like to replace that contact?
Price API is currently unavailable, please check back soon.
You haven\'t connected any apps yet.
app_name_placeholder wants to\nconnect to your wallet
You don\'t have any account that WalletConnect can connect.
The requested operation and/or account has not been authorized by the user.
The wallet does not support the requested operation.
This transaction will transfer ownership of this account. Your current recovery passphrase will no longer grant access to these assets.
Once confirmed, the connected application can send these transactions out at their discretion. Please make sure you review the transactions carefully as this process is irreversible.
This transaction is sending your full Algo balance.
This transaction is sending your full %1$s balance and will remove %1$s from your account.
This transaction fee is higher than the usual fee of 0.001 Algos.
WalletConnect is not reachable at the moment. Please try again later.
The recipient address is not a valid Algorand address. Please try again.
This transaction will be submitted in the future.
Couldn\'t create a session on WalletConnect. Please try with a valid URL.
You cannot send your max balance to yourself. Please select a different amount or recipient and try again.
You are creating a read-only view of an Algorand Account.
I already have an Pera Wallet but it\'s on a different phone.
Your FaceID or FingerprintID will be required to use the app. We recommend enabling biometric authentication to help increase wallet security in the event your phone is stolen.
Your passcode has been verified. Your Algorand account is more secure now.
Account not found. Please try again by entering the correct passphrase.
Congratulations, your account is ready to go.
Welcome to Pera Wallet! Your account is ready to use.
You are about to remove assetNamePlaceholder from accountNamePlaceholder. You will not be able to transact with this asset until you re-enable it.
To remove assetNamePlaceholder the balance must be 0. Please transfer the balance to another account and try again.
You are about to receive an asset to accountNamePlaceholder. Would you like to add this asset to this account to receive it?
Tell us how was your experience?
Transaction Request Rejected: The User has rejected the transaction request.
Transaction Request Rejected: The transaction group has failed validation by the Algorand SDK.
Transaction Request Rejected: The User currently has another transaction request that is in progress.
Signing Error: Network mismatch between dApp and Wallet. For example, Wallet is connected to TestNet and dApp connected to MainNet (or vice versa).
Signing Error: A transaction in the transaction request requires a private key (signer) that does not exist in the connected Wallet.
The transaction request contains an Unsupported Transaction Type
The transaction request contains an Unsupported Transaction Type: Multi-sig
Invalid Input: Transaction request contains more than %1$d transactions
Invalid Input: Unable to parse transaction
Invalid Input: Unable to be signed
Invalid Input: Group transaction does not need to be signed by Wallet user.
Invalid Input: The requested signer is not in the User Wallet
Close the Algorand app on the Ledger device.
On the Ledger home screen, confirm pairing.
Having Ledger Nano X connection issues?

Make sure the device is unlocked, nearby and has bluetooth enabled. If problems persist, please remove the device from your phone’s bluetooth settings, remove the ledger account, and then re-pair your Ledger following the Pera Wallet instructions.
The scanned QR is not a valid Algorand public address. For other types of QR (such as WalletConnect sessions), please use the scan QR button on the homepage.
Become a governor.\nVote on Algorand\'s future.\nEarn rewards.
The registration window for Governance Period #2 is Dec 25 to Jan 7, 16:00 UTC
We are sorry, but the dApp is not responding. Please refresh the page and try scanning a new QR Code. If the error persists, please contact the dApp.
The transaction has been signed and sent to peer_name_placeholder. Please visit peer_name_placeholder for the remaining process.
Do not share this passphrase with anyone, as it grants full access to your account.
If you do not have the corresponding recovery passphrase, do not send assets to this account.
Please make sure your Ledger is unlocked with Bluetooth enabled
Install the Algorand app onto your Ledger
Your transactions will be appeared here.
You will be able to view your NFT collections in the Pera Wallet soon.\n\nOur team is working hard to make this feature available. Stay tuned!

The total portfolio value is calculated by adding up all assets and Algo available in your accounts. If you hold multiple wallets, the Total Portfolio value is a sum of all accounts.

Asset prices are estimated based on daily values fetched from Tinyman. Please note that some asset values might not be available, therefore the total portfolio value should be considered an estimation.

Watch accounts are not considered a part of your portfolio and are not included in the Total Portfolio calculation.
We notice that this is your first transaction. Before you finalize, keep in mind a couple of tips:
Is your Ledger paired with this device?\nIf not, please follow these steps:

You are about to delete all data in the wallet, including your stored accounts. Make sure to have your account passphrases stored elsewhere before confirming. You will not be able to restore your accounts otherwise. Are you sure you would like to proceed?
Your data has been deleted successfully
Please return to peerNamePlaceholder to continue and finish your operation. You can find all connected Sessions in the dedicated Settings page.
Once pairing is confirmed on both Ledger and this device, open the Algorand Ledger app.

Based on your account configuration, your minimum balance is %1$s. By hitting continue, your transaction amount will be updated to maintain the Algorand Blockchain\'s minimum required balance. You\'ll be able to preview this change in the next steps.

Sending your maximum balance on this rekeyed account requires you to maintain a minimum balance of min_balance_placeholder Algos. This is to ensure that nothing changes with your rekeyed account. \n \n Your transaction amount will be automatically updated to reflect this change. You will be able to preview the transaction in the next steps.
It\'s Official!\nAlgorand Wallet is now Pera Wallet.

We are very excited to announce that Algorand Wallet is now called Pera Wallet. This is much more than a new name and logo. We are relaunching the most popular wallet in the Algorand ecosystem with a renewed focus on our roadmap, partner integrations, and community.

Don't worry, Pera Wallet is built and maintained by the same team and all the features you know and love are still here as usual – With many more to come in the upcoming months.

To read more about the relaunch and our roadmap, head over to the Pera Wallet blog

Sorry, we can\'t show the details of this account. It looks like we are having issues for the calculation.\n\nPlease note that some asset values might not be available, therefore the total portfolio value should be considered an estimation.

Sorry, we can\'t show the details of this portfolio. It looks like we are having issues for the calculation.\n\nPlease note that some asset values might not be available, therefore the total portfolio value should be considered an estimation.
After confirming pairing on your Ledger device, open the Algorand app.

If you’re having Ledger Nano X connection issues, please remove the device from your phone’s bluetooth settings, remove the ledger account, and then re-pair your Ledger following the Pera Wallet instructions.

External applications also called as dApps can make transaction requests that the Pera Wallet does not control. Please ensure you review these transactions carefully before approving and signing them.\n\nAll transactions are irreversible. Never approve transaction from dApp that you don\'t know.
This is the first transaction for the selected account. The first transactions require a minimum amount of at least 0.1 Algo. Please enter a valid amount and try again.
I want to create an account
Create a new Algorand account or add a watch account
Import an existing Algorand account via recovery passphrase or pair your Ledger
I want to create\nan Algorand account
Create a new Algorand account with a new address and recovery passphrase
I want to recover an Algorand account using my 25-word passphrase
I want to create an Algorand account that is backed by my Ledger hardware wallet
Your transaction was successfully received by the Algorand network.
MoonPay offers the fastest way to buy ALGO with your local currency. Buy crypto with credit card or bank transfers. It\'s fast, simple, and secure.
Your Algos are on their way!
Your payment is being processed. It can take few minutes to be completed.
Congratulations! Your account has been credited.
Your purchase request is pending payment. Once payment is processed, you will receive a notification.
Your purchase is waiting for authorization. Once payment is processed, you will receive a notification.
Looks like your purchase failed. You will need to try again.
I agree to share my e-mail address with Pera and receive updates on wallet features.
You cannot purchase while on TestNet. Please switch back to MainNet from Settings to use MoonPay.

Your WalletConnect request failed with the following error:

errorMessagePlaceholder

Please try again by going back to the dApp where you initiated the request.
The Watch Account has been added successfully.
